retrieved_content.content:
Here is the content extracted from the provided HTML. It appears to be a webpage that provides advice and tips on saving money, particularly in relation to food shopping and reducing food waste. The page includes sections on shopping deals, cooking and meal planning, household budgeting, reducing expenses, and reusing items. The site also has a link to an app for sharing excess food.

Title: Save Money On Food - Advice For Budgeting, Meal Planning & More!
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Supermarket Shopping Deals

* [MoneySavingExpert](https://www.moneysavingexpert.com/shopping/cheap-supermarket-shopping/)
* [Which?](https://www.which.co.uk/news/article/ease-the-squeeze-how-to-save-money-on-your-food-bills-a7vxy6C7SnXS)
* [HSBC](https://www.hsbc.co.uk/financial-fitness/everyday-budgeting/food-shopping-how-to-save-money-and-waste-less/)

### Cooking & Meal Planning

* [Food Savvy](https://www.foodsavvy.org.uk/) (advice about how to waste less food)
* [Love Food Hate Waste](https://www.lovefoodhatewaste.com/) (advice about how to waste less food)
* [Olio](https://olioex.com/) (free app for sharing excess food)
* [Too Good To Go](https://toogoodtogo.co.uk/en-gb) (app where users can buy 'Magic Bags' of food, directly from businesses, at a heavily discounted rate)
* [Kitche](https://kitche.co/) (app that provides recipes according to what you already have in your cupboard)

### Household Budgeting & Expenses

Additional resources for reducing expenses and managing household budgets will be added soon.

### Reusing Items

To reduce waste and save money, consider reusing items when possible instead of throwing them away. You can donate, sell, or give away items that are still in good condition, or repurpose them for other uses. There are many online resources available to help you find ways to reuse common household items.

For example:

* [Ideas For Reusing Household Items](https://www.wikihow.com/Reuse-Household-Items) (a wikiHow article with ideas for reusing a variety of everyday items)
* The [Reuse Network](https://reusenetwork.org/) is an organization that aims to promote and facilitate reuse in the UK. Their website provides advice, resources, and information about local opportunities for reusing items.

Reason.next_actions: Consult other government resources or contact the council directly to inquire about specific steps involved in applying for free school meals.
